entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The title of a book mentioned in the text.

entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: The librarian of the library, described as a thin and irritable woman.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, mentioned as trying to keep a note from Madam Pince.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, mentioned as helping Hermione with the note.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: A person mentioned as being willing to sign anything if it stands still long enough.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: The ghost of a girl who haunts the bathroom, mentioned as being barricaded in with Hermione and Ron.

relationships.description: Hermione tries to keep a note from Madam Pince, but Madam Pince eventually takes it.
Ron helps Hermione by taking the note from her and giving it to Madam Pince.
Hermione mentions that Lockhart will sign anything if it stands still long enough.
Hermione and Ron barricade themselves in Moaning Myrtle's bathroom.
